coreMetaEdSourceDirectory.title: Ed-Fi Data Standard core .metaed directory
coreMetaEdSourceDirectory.description: Full path to the set of core MetaEd files for the Ed-Fi Data Standard.

metaEdConsoleSourceDirectory.title: MetaEd Console executable directory
metaEdConsoleSourceDirectory.description: Full path to the MetaEd Console directory.

edfiOdsApiSourceDirectory.title: Ed-Fi ODS / API source directory
edfiOdsApiSourceDirectory.description: Full path to root folder for the Ed-Fi ODS / API source code.  The folder this points to should contain Ed-Fi-ODS and Ed-Fi-ODS-Implementation folders.

cmdFullPath.title: Full path to Windows command prompt (cmd.exe)
cmdFullPath.description: Full path to cmd.exe, used to spawn the MetaEd Console and provide highlighted output.

validateOnTheFly.title: Enable validation as you type (experimental)
validateOnTheFly.description: Performs validation on the fly (instead of on save).  May introduce a delay in the editor UI.  Requires Atom restart after changing.

useTechPreview.title: Enable Technical Preview functionality
useTechPreview.description: Use Technical Preview enhancements.  Requires the Ed-Fi Data Standard core .metaed directory to point to the core version used in the Technical Preview.  Requires Atom restart after changing.

telemetryConsent.title: Consent to anonymous usage reporting
telemetryConsent.description: Select whether you are willing to submit anonymous usage information to the Ed-Fi Alliance server. Broadly, we send things like performance metrics and exceptions.

allianceMode.title: Alliance only
allianceMode.description: For Alliance users only.  Requires Atom restart.
